name: Name
not_link: Go back to the main page
foot_txt: Quality does not have to be expensive - with us you will get stylish wallpapers at low prices!
about_txt: Welcome to the "About Us" page of Xandecor! We are proud to have been producing high quality wallpaper for our customers for over 5 years. Our company pays great attention to the quality of products, so we offer only the best wallpapers for your home or business. We offer more than 60 different ranges of wallpapers, which allows you to choose the perfect option for any interior. We also strive to be an environmentally responsible company and use only the highest quality sustainable materials in the production of our wallpapers. In addition, we are proud that our prices remain low despite the high quality of our products. We believe that everyone deserves a beautiful and quality interior, and our goal is to make it accessible to everyone. We are located in Uzbekistan, and our company is the leader in the wallpaper market in our country. We are proud that our wallpapers are used in a variety of projects, including residential and commercial premises, hotels and restaurants. We strive to ensure that every customer receives excellent service and products that exceed their expectations. We thank you for choosing our company and hope that our wallpapers will be a great addition to your home or business!
adv1: High quality at low prices: We offer quality wallpapers at prices that are lower than many of our competitors.
adv2: Variety of Designs: We offer a wide range of wallpaper designs to suit any interior.
adv3: Professional Service: Our team is always ready to help you choose the right wallpaper and answer all your questions.
adv4: Flexible shipping terms: We offer a variety of shipping methods, including express shipping and free shipping for orders over a certain amount.
